    • combineARFFFiles

      public static void combineARFFFiles​(java.lang.String pOutputDir) throws java.lang.Exception
      combineARFFFiles combines arff files from the pOutputDir directory into one combined arff file in that directory. This assumes that all the arff files have the same attributes and enumerated values within the arff files. This will create a "combined.arff" file
      Parameters:

      string -
